Art. 4.197. 
Hereditary option 
The universal legatees and the legatees by universal title are not obliged to accept the legacy made to them. They may accept it, purely and simply, or under benefit of inventory, or renounce it.
The provisions of sub-title 6 of title 1 relating to the hereditary option apply to them by analogy, except article 4.45.
